channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Clanfolk’: Try This Chilled-Out ‘RimWorld’ Alternative
item.description: If you're a fan of colony builder 'Rimworld', but can't cope with its mad randomness, the more sedate 'Clanfolk' is worth a try

item.title: The Zoom stretch
item.description: There are a lot of structural reasons why in-person meetings don’t involve a break every 12 minutes. It takes too long to stop and start. But those rules don’t apply to Zoom. Screens off! Stand up. We’ll be back in 60 seconds. If it’s not worth coming back, the meeting should have ended already. If […]

item.title: Jupiter’s ‘Great Red Spot’ Is Shrinking — And Scientists Think They Know Why
item.description: Jupiter's iconic "Great Red Spot" is shrinking due to interactions with smaller storms, which could have implications for extreme weather on Earth.

item.title: Important change is systems change
item.description: Willpower is overrated. If you want to eat healthier, don’t work hard to avoid stopping at the cookie jar when you walk into the kitchen. Get rid of the cookie jar. Systems are long-lasting, widespread and resilient. We can push back on them with effort, but over time, the system usually comes out ahead. Once […]

item.title: Microsoft Windows Deadline—Why You Need To Update Your PC By July 30
item.description: US Government warns users to update or shut down Windows PCs by July 30.

item.title: A bowl of rice
item.description: It’s expensive. Hundreds of people were involved in getting you that simple bowl of rice. It involved countless gallons of water, hours of labor, gallons of fuel. A complex supply chain that ensured you got what you needed, in perfect condition, just as you were ready for it. And it’s cheap. The amount of time […]

item.title: ‘Evangelion’ Is Getting Its Own Samurai Action Figure Next Year
item.description: Courtesy of those nice people at Sentinel, they are making a new 'Evangelion' figure in the style of a samurai for release early next year.

item.title: The two bicycle errors
item.description: Momentum activities like public speaking, board sports and leadership all share an attribute with riding a bicycle: It gets easier when you get good at it. The first error we often make is believing that someone (even us) will never be good at riding a bike, because riding a bike is so difficult. When we’re […]

item.title: ‘Earth Defense Force 6’ PlayStation 5 Review: A Proper Bug Hunt
item.description: It’s taken two years for 'Earth Defense Force 6' to finally come Westward, but it’s lost none of its charm or appeal now that it is finally here.

item.title: Doing it step by step
item.description: I was surprised to discover that for many AI questions, if you add, “please figure this out step by step,” the AI will provide a dramatically more accurate and useful answer. This works on simple questions like, “how many times does the letter ‘r’ appear in the word ‘strawberry'” to much more complex issues. It […]
